title: Associate Data Scientist
responsibilities:
Selected intern's day-to-day responsibilities include:

1. Collaborate seamlessly with cross-functional tech teams to architect, develop, and maintain our suite of innovative software products.
2. Demonstrate prowess in coding, debugging, and troubleshooting, ensuring the delivery of high-quality solutions.
3. Conduct research to identify innovative data science techniques and methodologies that align with the company's product goals.
4. Share ideas and perspectives to improve processes and deliver value to the product and the team.
5. Efficiently manage deadlines and deliverables, exhibiting a results-oriented approach.
6. Continuously enhance skills and knowledge to stay aligned with industry trends and company needs.
7. Cultivate strong communication skills to articulate ideas effectively within the
team, contributing to the creation of a product that is a true work of art.
skills_required: APIs, Computer Vision, Keras, LLMOps, Machine Learning, MongoDB, Natural Language Processing (NLP), Python, SQL
other_requirements:
1. Expertise and hands-on experience in Python coding, including proficiency in  related frameworks and libraries.                

                    2. Deep understanding and development of backend applications and APIs using Flask, Django, etc., with experience scaling APIs for high-performance needs.                

                    3. Solid understanding and knowledge of databases such as MongoDB, SQL, etc., with a focus on optimizing data structures and improving overall performance.                

                    4. Strong understanding of machine learning models and methodologies, with proficiency in libraries like Scikit-learn, TensorFlow, and PyTorch, and the ability to apply them effectively in real-world scenarios.                

                    5. Hands-on experience working with neural networks, computer vision, and natural language processing (NLP) techniques using libraries such as Keras, OpenCV, Hugging Face Transformers, and SpaCy to solve complex problems.                

                    6. Knowledge and hands-on experience with large language models (LLMs) such as LLaMA and Mistral etc , along with experience in fine-tuning LLMs.                

                    7. Comprehensive knowledge of asynchronous APIs, including their design, implementation, and optimization for enhanced performance.                

                    8. Good understanding of model training and deployment on cloud platforms like Azure, GCP, and AWS.                

                    9. Experience with distributed data processing frameworks like Apache Spark or                

                    10. Hadoop for working with large datasets.
company_description: DataNeuron aims to accelerate and scale the development of AI models. We do this by providing a data-centric, end-to-end solution to annotate, train, and manage end-to-end ML models and ready prediction algorithms without writing any code!

title: Python Expert
responsibilities:
Selected intern's day-to-day responsibilities include:

1. Writing Python scripts for data processing, transformation, and model training/testing.
2. Building and optimizing data pipelines using libraries such as pandas and NumPy to process large datasets for model training or evaluation.
3. Developing APIs using frameworks such as FastAPI or Flask to serve AI model predictions efficiently.
4. Developing, training, and evaluating machine learning and deep learning models (e.g., classification, regression, or NLP tasks).
5. Preprocessing textual data (tokenization, stemming, lemmatization, stopword removal) for NLP tasks.
6. Fine-tuning large language models (LLMs) such as GPT, LLaMA, or Falcon using domain-specific data.
7. Working with word embeddings (e.g., Word2Vec, GloVe) or transformer-based embeddings (e.g., BERT, GPT).
8. Evaluating model performance using metrics such as perplexity, BLEU, and ROUGE, and conducting human evaluations for text generation tasks.
9. Collecting and integrating large datasets from various sources (web scraping, public datasets, APIs).
10. Managing dataset versioning using tools such as DVC or Hugging Face Datasets.
11. Working with distributed systems (e.g., Apache Spark, Dask) for large-scale data processing.
12. Leveraging GPU resources (using CUDA, cuDNN) for model training.
13. Managing cloud resources (e.g., AWS EC2, GCP, Lambda Labs) for training and inference.
14. Using Docker and Kubernetes for containerizing and deploying applications and models at scale.
skills_required: Algorithms, Amazon EC2, Apache Spark, APIs, Data Structures, Deep Learning, Docker, Embedded C, GitHub, GraphQL, Hugging Face, Machine Learning, Microsoft Azure, Natural Language Processing (NLP), NumPy, Pandas, Python, Python Libraries, PyTorch
other_requirements: 1. The candidate must be able to explain each of these concepts while working on live project.
company_description: Lelekart, under the adept guidance of Kaushal Ranjeet Private Limited, is an Indian e-commerce pioneer committed to transforming fashion retail. We blend style, quality, and affordability, offering an array of clothing that speaks to your individuality.

title: Machine Learning
responsibilities:
Are you a passionate Machine Learning enthusiast with a solid foundation in Python, Data Analytics, Data Science, Natural Language Processing (NLP), and Deep Learning? Neurasys is looking for a talented intern to join our dynamic team and work on cutting-edge projects in the field of AI and machine learning.

Key Responsibilities:
1. Collaborate with the team to develop and implement machine learning models for various applications.
2. Conduct data analysis, data cleaning, and preprocessing to ensure high-quality datasets for training models.
3. Work on NLP tasks such as sentiment analysis, text classification, and language modeling.
4. Utilize deep learning algorithms to build and optimize neural networks for image and text data.
5. Assist in the evaluation and testing of model performance, making improvements as needed.
6. Stay updated on the latest trends and advancements in machine learning to contribute innovative ideas.
7. Communicate effectively with team members to share progress, challenges, and solutions.

If you are eager to gain hands-on experience in the exciting world of AI and machine learning, apply now and embark on a rewarding journey with Neurasys!
skills_required: Data Analytics, Data Science, Deep Learning, Machine Learning, Natural Language Processing (NLP), Python
perks: Certificate, Letter of recommendation, Flexible work hours, 5 days a week
company_description: Neurasys is a dynamic technology and software development firm, founded in 2021, offering a wide range of enterprise-grade solutions. With a specialization in both data science and web development, they serve clients globally and maintain a strong reputation for delivering high-quality, scalable digital products.

title: Research Writing Assistance- AI/ML
responsibilities:
Selected intern's day-to-day responsibilities include:

1. Review and analyze research papers, ensuring quality checks and providing improvement suggestions
2. Work on coding and conducting research in AI/ML, assisting as needed
3. Define and refine project scope, ensuring clarity and feasibility
4. Write reports and code, co-authoring as per requirement

Note: This involves a large portion of report preparation and academic paper preparation
skills_required: Artificial intelligence, Data Science, Data Structures, Deep Learning, Machine Learning, Natural Language Processing (NLP), Neural Networks, Python
other_requirements:
1. The candidate shall be good at writing reports and academic papers                

                    2. People with a minimum 2 papers published are requested to apply
perks: Certificate, Letter of recommendation, Flexible work hours, 5 days a week
company_description: House of Couton Private Limited runs 'Feba', a proximity marketing platform to target customers present around retail stores to convert them for sales by enabling retailers to deliver nearby campaigns and lists of customers nearby to engage with them through personalized campaigns.

title: Artificial Intelligence (AI)
responsibilities:
As an artificial intelligence (AI) intern at Coding Junior, you will have the opportunity to work on cutting-edge projects and gain hands-on experience in the field of AI. If you are proficient in Python, data structures, machine learning, data science, neural networks, natural language processing (NLP), and deep learning, this internship is perfect for you.

Selected intern's day-to-day responsibilities include:

1. Assist in developing AI models and algorithms to solve complex problems.
2. Conduct research on AI technologies and trends to provide insights for project development.
3. Collaborate with team members to design and implement AI solutions.
4. Test and optimize AI models to ensure accuracy and efficiency.
5. Analyze and interpret data to extract meaningful insights for decision-making.
6. Stay up-to-date with the latest advancements in AI and implement best practices.
7. Present findings and recommendations to stakeholders in a clear and concise manner. 

Join us at Coding Junior and take your AI skills to the next level!
skills_required: Artificial intelligence, Data Science, Data Structures, Deep Learning, Machine Learning, Natural Language Processing (NLP), Neural Networks, Python
other_requirements: Job offer: On successful conversion to a permanent employee, the candidate can expect a salary of ₹ 600000 to 2400000/year
perks: Certificate, Letter of recommendation, 5 days a week, Job offer
company_description: We are a team of IIT, BHU, and IIM Ahmedabad graduates working in the education technology sector. Before this, we have already co-founded a bunch of companies. Coding Junior is a Delhi and Singapore-based startup aiming to help educators teach with the help of our software.
